title: The Last Dance
description: RhysI was on my way out of the life when she came barging in with her new appetite and unrealistic expectations of what a Dom should be. All I had left to do to break free was sell the club and walk away. Now I found I had something to walk toward. And for the first time in my life, I hoped I’d be enough for a woman.Caring for a woman was easy for me. I had always cared for different women for different reasons. Loving a woman had always been quite a bit harder.Doms don’t have to say I love you.VioletThe last two months of my life had altered me in ways I could never have imagined. When I set out to discover myself sexually, I never expected to fall in love with the only man who calmed my world and both tortured and soothed my senses. I'd been snapped out of my fantasy by the latest slap of reality.Little did I know … reality wasn't finished with me yet.This is book three of a four part series. FILTHY EROTIC ROMANCE. STRONG LANGUAGE AND SEXUAL SITUATIONS.
author: Angelica Chase
